sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A booke of presidentes exactly written in maner of a register. Newly corrected, with additions of dyuers necessarie presidents, meete for al such as desire to learne the fourme and maner how to make all maner of euidences, and instruments, as in the table of this booke more plainlie appeareth. Book of precedents Phayer, Thomas, 1510?-1560, attributed name.
[1+] leaves
by Rychard Tottle, Anno Domini. 1588. Imprinted at London : [1583]
Sometimes ascribed to Thomas Phayer who wrote the preface to the 1543 edition. Phayer's preface dropped from editions following 1546.--STC. Publisher's name from STC. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
=======
A booke of presidentes exactly written in maner of a register. Newly corrected, with additions of dyuers necessarie presidents, meete for al such as desire to learne the fourme and maner how to make all maner of euidences, and instruments, as in the table of this booke more plainlie appeareth. Book of precedents Phayer, Thomas, 1510?-1560, attributed name.
[1+] leaves
by Rychard Tottle, Anno Domini. 1588. Imprinted at London : [1583]
Sometimes ascribed to Thomas Phayer who wrote the preface to the 1543 edition. Phayer's preface dropped from editions following 1546.--STC. Publisher's name from STC. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
